knimeNode.name: Probability Distribution Splitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits a Probability Distribution Cell into Double cells containing the single probabilities.

fullDescription.intro: Splits a column containing a probability distribution into many columns containing its single probabilities.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the column containing the probability distribution.
If selected, the selected column will be removed from the output.
Specify a suffix for the probability columns. By default, no suffix is defined and the columns are named by their class names.

Specify how to treat a missing value in the input column. If Fail is selected, the node will fail. Otherwise, the node just gives a warning and puts missing values in the output for the corresponding rows.

ports.inPort: Data with a column containing a probability distribution.
ports.outPort: Input data with appended columns that contain the single probabilities of the probability distribution.
